name: logseq-transcriber
description: Transcribe audio files directly within Logseq using a powerful speech-to-text API.
author: AI Assistant

settings.title: API Key
settings.description: Your API Key from Deepgram. Get one at [console.deepgram.com](https://console.deepgram.com/project/_/api-keys).

settings.title: Transcription Model
settings.description: Model to use (e.g., nova-3, whisper-large). See [Deepgram Models](https://developers.deepgram.com/docs/model) for options.

settings.title: Audio Language
settings.description: Select the primary language of the audio or choose 'Auto-detect'. See [Supported Languages](https://developers.deepgram.com/docs/models-languages-overview).
